accessibility.text: Gain during inflationary periods: Borrowers pay less in real terms and most wages are protected from inflation by their labor contract
Income Pyramid
Low Incomes
Lose during inflationary periods: Inflation erodes their real returns and they are unfairly taxed
High Incomes
